title: Senior HR IT Manager-Business Solutions
responsibilities: Position Overview Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications, and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. Our OIT Enterprise Applications team is currently seeking a passionate Senior IT manager, focusing on Business Solutions to drive business decisions and functional alignment for the Workday HR and future Finance implementation to empower overseas business growth and enhance employee experience. This role is an integral member of the HR IT leadership team. Primary Duties & Responsibilities: As a Senior IT Manager, you will be an integral part of the leadership team responsible for solution design and review of all business processes and system level changes as part of continual service improvement, leveraging Workday, ServiceNow SaaS platforms and related integrations. You will provide design perspectives to the process teams, assess current state processes and tools, identify Workday and ServiceNow platform solution options, define solution requirements, determine, and define integration requirements, and develop overall architecture and implementation plans while utilizing current vendor solution capabilities and the product roadmaps.
qualifications: - At least 3 years of experience managing HR IT teams in a large tech or leading startup company, with a fast pace and dynamic business environment. - Deep and broad knowledge of HR IT systems and business processes, experience with Workday, with experience of leading solution design and implementation across modules (i. e. HCM Core, Compensation, Payroll, Recruiting) for large and or complex organizations. - Bring a depth of expertise in understanding the touchpoints and interdependencies between modules, and third-party solutions and will own the solution design and lead the functional team to successfully deliver unified employee experience powered by Workday. - Demonstratable abilities to lead IT and business team to find practical business and technical solutions for business problems, and provide day to day leadership. - Work alongside our internal technology and consulting teams, you will focus design on user experience to deliver best in class solutions for Tencent overseas operations. - Develop proof of concept solutions based on business requirements and build strong relationships with key stakeholders and subject matter experts. - As a manager of the team, you’ll be responsible for managing and developing teams, and serve in a delivery assurance capacity for all project deliverables - Act as the Enterprise Apps subject matter expert at Executive briefings / marketing events– communicate commitments, expectations, etc. Qualifications - Based in the Bay area, 3+ years experience as HR IT manager in a fast pace leading tech company. - More than 10 years of experience in the IT industry. - 5 or more years of experience in Workday Implementation strategy and execution in HRIT function - Strong communication skills, and experience in interacting with executive leadership - Engaging presentation style, with the ability to control and manage complex stakeholder groups - Experience delivering large scale Workday engagements or complex IT engagements - A customer-focused approach to work, and the ability support in the development of digital platform strategies - Excellent analytical, organizational, and problem-solving skills - Strong communication (oral and written) and interpersonal skills required to interact with colleagues and internal customers - Ability to work effectively with others who are in remote locations and varying time zones - A bachelor's degree, preferably in Computer Science, Information Systems Management, Engineering, or similar discipline; supported by experience in a similar technical environment - Fluency in Chinese speaking and writing is a big plus. Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills / Experience): - Experience with Agile and Scalable Agile methodologies - Bilingual (English, Chinese) strongly preferred

title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend (Cloud)
responsibilities: Position Overview: We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer with extensive cloud experience to design and develop innovative services / solutions on the cloud for Tencent overseas game studios. Duties and Responsibilities: As a Senior Software Engineer, you will work in the agile team, adopt to test-driven development methodologies to continuously deliver services / solutions that meet fast growing business requirements. You will be able to use cutting-edge technologies to resolve most challengeable requirements on mixed multi-cloud environment. Our internal customers include internal or acquired gaming studios. The work scope will include understanding the internal customers’ business requirements, collecting the technical requirements, developing reference architecture and prototypes based on leading industry best practice, leading implementation and deployment for global locations, as well as issue troubleshooting when necessary. Based in Palo Alto, CA, this person will work closely with the global IT team, HQ teams.
qualifications: Who we are looking for: - A quick learner - A positive, self-motivated, and passionate person - Independent, insistent, and open minded - A great team player, and both dependable and autonomous - Customer oriented and could work at a very fast pace Requirements - 3+ years of enterprise software design and development experience - 3+ years of experience on either Python, Java, C#, Java or C++ - Solid understanding of OO design - Excellent problem-solving skills - Deep understanding of agile software development methodologies - Rich experience on test-driven development - 3+ experience on either AWS, Azure or GCP etc. cloud platforms - Bachelor’s degree (or higher), Computer Science, Mathematics, or related science or engineering major Nice to have: - Frontend design and development experience - Network Security knowledge and experience - Bilingual preferred (English, Chinese). Excellent written and verbal communication skills and be able to adjust style to match different audiences About Tencent Overseas IT and Cloud CoE: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications, and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. Cloud Center of Excellence team is part of Tencent Oversea IT. The team will laser focus on providing infrastructure, best practice to enable Tencent’s tens oversea game studios. The team will partner with game studios to define and deliver the best cloud and on-premises infrastructure for both game production and game runtime workloads. You will work for our strategic Cloud-enable Studio project which aims to transform the game studios from traditional on-premises environment to next generation distributed and remote accessible virtual studio empowered by the latest cloud technology.

title: Lightspeed LA: Senior Sound Designer
responsibilities: Lightspeed LA: Senior sound Designer This is an exciting opportunity for an experienced, passionate, creative and technical Senior Sound Designer to join our in-house sound team and help create world-class audio content on a new and exciting open-world AAA game. Responsibilities: - Design and implement immersive, next-gen audio content and systems to engage players and enrich game narrative. - Design, edit, mix and master audio assets. - Implement and author interactive, real-time sound using middleware and scripting tools to bring soundscapes to life. - Author and integrate audio assets through middleware and in-engine (UE4 / UE5). - Create and edit new sound effects using various recording techniques, professional audio editing tools, plug-ins, hardware and props. - Work closely with Audio engineers to design systems and methodologies with the goal to raise the bar in game audio. - Collaborate with the Audio Director and Audio Lead to execute and deliver on audio features and ensure defined aesthetic is met throughout production. - Engage in the planning and execution of recording sessions in the field, studio and mocap stage, recording real-world sounds and foley. - Sound design and mix cinematic audio content to blend seamlessly with gameplay audio.
qualifications: Qualifications: - Understand emotion and tension in storytelling, and be able to design narrative-driven audio. - Excellent sound design aesthetic with a keen ear for detail. - 3+ years of experience in AAA game audio. - A minimum of one AAA title shipped as Lead Sound Designer or equivalent. - A desire to push game audio further with new ideas and methodologies. - A grasp of logic and scripting methods for interactive audio implementation within a game engine. - Imaginative and creative use of audio production tools, foley performance and capture, props, and recording techniques to create high-quality original content. - Fluent in interactive audio and post production techniques. - Expert command of sound design & mixing techniques, processes and tools. - Ability to create world-class audio content spread across multiple styles and genres. - WWISE middleware proficiency. - Field and studio recording experience. - Competency in UE4, Blueprint, and scripting. - Proficiency in Nuendo, Pro-Tools or Reaper - Experience / familiarity with industry standard plugins (Fab Filter, Altiverb, Waves, Izotope, etc) Desirable skills and Experience - Experience designing sounds and sound systems for weapons, vehicles, physics, and weather. - Experience working on environmental audio, sound propagation and 3D audio - Technical skills and understanding of audio rendering and compression technologies, and codecs.

title: Senior Data Scientist
responsibilities: - Work with large-scale datasets and solve complex business and technical problems through analysis, modeling, and platform solutions. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to run end-to-end experiments, including experiment design, and experiment analysis, as well as communicating experiment results to partner and leadership team for making business decisions. - Partner with engineering and product team to build and deploy scalable experimentation platform solutions to support multiple products and studios. - Conduct applied research and develop methodology in experimentation, causal inference, causal learning, statistical models, and machine learning to solve business problems and create user value. - Explore opportunities broadly with an open mindset and leverage various data science methods flexibly, to identify high-impact opportunities, initiate project ideas, prototype solutions, and drive project completion. - Contribute to data science best practices, processes, training, and sharing, to build data science culture and technical advances.
qualifications: - M. S. , or Ph. D. in a quantitative discipline such as Statistics, Math, Economics, Computer Science, Machine Learning, or equivalent practical experience. Ph. D. with Strong publication record preferred; - 3+ years of experience applying analytics, inference, experimentation, or machine learning methods in business scenarios preferred; - Breadth and depth knowledge of data science methods and best practices, such as data analysis and visualization, experimentation, causal inference, supervised learning, unsupervised learning, time series, probabilities, and sampling methods; - Experience programming in SQL, Python, R, or related language; - Experience with Big Data technologies such as Hadoop, Hive, Spark, etc. preferred; - Experience with building complex analytics / experimentation / machine learning platforms on large datasets preferred.

title: Senior Data Scientist
responsibilities: * Join a highly-skilled data science team to mine through data to identify data-driven opportunities in game production, publishing, and live-ops. * Work with large datasets and apply advanced analytic methods to solve challenging problems and deliver scalable solutions. * Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes and provide end-to-end data products with large-scale data analysis, A / B testing, machine / deep learning model development, validation, and serving. * Interact cross-functionally with various teams and provide actionable business insights to stakeholders. * Research and develop novel machine learning solutions to support game development and business decision-making.
qualifications: * Ph. D. with a specialization in computer science, operational research, mathematics, statistics, economics, or a quantitative field. * Deep and extensive knowledge in one or more of the following areas: deep learning, reinforcement learning, statistical learning, natural language processing, computer vision / graphics, recommendation systems, big data technologies, and other data science domains. * Expert in statistical analysis (probabilities, hypothesis testing, multivariate analysis, time series analysis, generalized linear model, A / B experiments). * Proficient in SQL and Python (or other higher-level programming languages like Java, C++, Scala, etc. ). * Experience with Big Data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, Pig, Hive, etc. is preferred. * Ability to understand complex subjects clearly and propose actionable data-driven solutions. Good business acumen and communication skills are a plus.

title: Senior Data Engineer
responsibilities: * Design, build and own the core data models and systems that able to support petabyte of data pipeline across the Tencent's overseas games. * Analyse large amounts of players’ data with business use cases to bridge the gaps of data-driven lifecycles. * Partner with multiple internal teams and external partners to collect requirements and deliver large-scale data solutions for various analytics and business applications. * Collaborate with product managers to define, create, and maintain data applications and platform such as real-time platforms, data pipeline, telemetry implementation, and machine learning deployment to help achieve Tencent's publishing goals. * The challenges range from building real-time and offline distributed data processing pipelines for feature engineering and automation as well as building systems and frameworks to deploy, scale, test, manage and monitor real-time machine learning models and user acquisition algorithms.
qualifications: * Ph. D. in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or equivalent technical field. Programming and scripting language (e. g. SQL, Python, Java / Scala, Golang). * Experience in backend development experience with interest in work involving data pipelines, distributed systems, performance analysis, and large-scale data processing. * Experience working with distributed data technologies (e. g. Hadoop, MapReduce, Spark, Flink, Kafka, Impala, HBase etc. ) for building efficient and large-scale data pipelines. * Experience shipping scalable data solutions in the cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP) and database technologies such as Snowflake, Redshift, SQL / NoSQL and or columnar databases. * Dynamic team player with ability to manage numerous requests concurrently and strategically, prioritizing when necessary. * Strong problem-solving skills with an ability to isolate, deconstruct and resolve complex data engineering challenges. * Ability to communicate with worldwide business stakeholders regard data products and technical requests. Proven track record to clearly form and communicate ideas to both technical and non-technical worldwide audiences. Bonus: * Experience strongly preferred building stream-processing applications using Apache Flink, Spark-Streaming, Apache Storm, Kafka Streams or others. * Explore modern data storage, messaging, and processing tools (Kafka, Spark, Hadoop, Cassandra, etc. ) and demonstrated experience designing and coding in big-data components such as DynamoDB or similar. * Familiar with concepts related to testing and maintaining models in production such as A / B testing, retraining, monitoring model performance.

title: Narrative intern
responsibilities: As a Narrative Intern at TENCENT, you will support the chief narrative designer and help coordinate between them and the core team. Part administrative assistant, part creative, you will support the vision established by the chief narrative designer and the directors by participating in the realization of the narrative goals of the game. In your coordinator aspect, you’ll be placed to have a unique view of the development of the project, and as a burgeoning creative, you’ll get tasks and direct support from the chief narrative designer. What you’ll do: Partner with the chief narrative designer to understand the overall game vision. Be a key link between HQ and the global narrative team. This means being available for critical meetings, taking excellent notes, and ensuring that all parties have a good understanding of what is needed and expected of them. Create and maintain narrative documentation. Brainstorm and research ideas and discuss your findings with collaborative teams. Work with other writers, designers, and artists to develop consistent content (plot, setting, characters, barks, dialogue, events, lore, item descriptions, menu text, tutorials, etc. ). Write, rewrite, proofread, polish (and repeat). Revise your work to reflect comments from interdependent teams and changes to gameplay. Help with marketing or community teams, on a case-by-case basis. Help new members navigate the team structure and production pipeline.
qualifications: Qualifications: Speak and write perfect English and Mandarin. A highly creative, collaborate, and innovative spirit. Curiosity, flexibility, and plenty of resourcefulness. Excellent organizational, communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills. Ability to adapt to feedback. A desire to work in games and learn how to tell the best story we can. What we need CV A variety of samples of your best work (attach files or send a link to a portfolio). Whatever else HR needs.

title: Senior Payroll & Benefits Specialist
responsibilities: Position overview: The Senior Payroll & Benefits Specialist will be responsible for day-to-day US payroll and benefits administration, including 401(k) administration. The Senior Payroll and Benefits Specialist will also provide exceptional service to Tencent American employees and interact with internal and external shareholders including but not limited to HRBPs, IT, Finance, third party vendors and service providers. The role will report directly to North America Human Resource Director. What you will be doing: - Process multi-state semi-monthly payroll for hourly salaried employees, including reviewing and importing hours from time and attendance system, entering direct deposit information, administering regulatory requirements, garnishments, benefit deductions and taxes consistent with federal and state wage and hour laws - Ensure proper payroll deductions and contributions are made and perform semi-monthly / monthly audits - Maintain all payroll information related to the calculation, withholding and remittance of federal, state and local payroll taxes; enter data, update information and prepare reports as needed - Ensure proper new hire set-up in HRIS - Prepare employee communications related to employee payroll and benefit administration. - Administer time and attendance systems and leaves of absence requests - Act as expert on payroll platform and processing and continue to improve the payroll SOP - Audit HR, payroll, benefits and worker’s compensation data for accuracy. Identify and troubleshoot issues - Coordinate and administer annual open enrollment process, including but not limited to preparing and distributing materials, conducting employee meetings with vendor reps and processing changes to meet deadlines, HRIS system setup & testing - Handle 401(k) Plan Administration, including annual employee meetings, employee deferrals and loan processing - Respond to unemployment claims - Other duties as assigned

title: Principal Product Manager and Team Lead – Cloud Enabled Studio Management Platform
responsibilities: Position Overview: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. Duties and Responsibilities: This principal role will closely work with our internal IT and Tencent cloud product teams, as well 3rd party cloud providers to design the best global cloud architecture and solution, to enable rapid employee and business growth in Overseas market (outside China). At the same time, this role will also support the studio’s legacy infrastructure and its evolution to the cloud. Our customers include internal or acquired gaming studios, innovative offices / workplaces, various business groups and external customers. The work scope will include understanding the internal customers’ business requirements, collecting the technical requirements, designing the product roadmap and features, developing reference architecture and prototypes based on leading industry best practice, leading implementations and deployments for global locations, as well as issue troubleshooting when necessary. Having worked extensively as a senior role, the right candidate will excel at designing flexible, scalable, secure, cost effective global cloud first (+ on prem or hybrid cloud in some cases) solutions, as well as understanding the unique and common needs of customer, influence / convince / drive the customer adoption of our global IT platform and solutions. He / she will have led the successful delivery completion of multiple multi availability zone, cross region, PaaS, IaaS based implementations, and in the delivery of clear standards, guidelines, documentation to stakeholder groups. Based in Palo Alto, CA or Seattle, WA, this person will work closely with the global Overseas IT team, HQ team to enable / deliver our global IT project portfolio.
qualifications: Who we are looking for: - Self-motivated, articulate, passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction. And you see no conflict in any of these things. - Knowledgeable, resourceful and show initiative. You always keep the customer’s objectives in mind. - Positive by nature, a great team player, and both dependable and autonomous. - Customer oriented, and could work at a very fast pace; Requirements - Must have 5+ years extensive cloud and on prem engineering experience in leading Internet or high-tech companies. Global working experience a big plus. - Must have 3+ years engineering experience with one of the following leading cloud solutions: Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, and Tencent Cloud. Experience in multi-cloud a big plus. - Must have experience to lead cloud product and architect team. Knows how to lead a team, break down tasks, and steer the execution. - Experience to lead outsourcing R&D team. - Must understand the legacy infrastructure technologies, such as network, servers and other related technology. - Must have experience on helping business migrating from legacy infrastructure to cloud. - Proficient in leading the design and implementation of a flexible, scalable, secure, global cloud solution, with comprehensive Cyber security, data security, privacy management that are compliant with global and local regulations. - Can effectively collect, synthesize customer (for example internal and acquired game studios) needs and challenges, design / lead the establishment of global IT foundation architecture and solutions. - Can develop relationships with China based Tencent HQ product / IT teams and overseas business / IT teams, leverage our products where ever fit. title: Senior / Principal Character Technical Art Director
responsibilities: About Us Founded in 2008, Lightspeed & Quantum Studios is an in-house studio of Tencent Games with strong global presence. In addition to developing our own leading titles, we also partner with and invest in exceptional companies across PC & mobile games, digital media, and eSports, such as: Epic Games, Riot Games, Crafton and many more, providing service in over 200 countries / regions and offering high-quality gaming experiences to hundreds of millions of users worldwide. Under Lightspeed and Quantum, Art center makes up of many top game industry veterans as well as young and inspiring talents. We work on all of Lightspeed's creative projects with artists from technical art, concept art, 3D modeling, cinematics, comics, and more. With a profound love for games, Art Center is committed to exploring how the latest, cutting-edge technology can be applied to the artistic projects we oversee. We do our utmost to create future-oriented products, improving the visual quality of our studio's games. Lightspeed's Art Center is currently looking for talented and enthusiastic Senior Technical art Director and Character TD to work with our most exciting overseas projects based in LA, Vancouver and Toronto, focusing on creating a AAA open world console game for the Western market . The ideal candidate will have a strong passion for games and supporting artists and animators in delivering stunning real time visuals for our players. Join our team of industry veterans and help shape a world class team that embraces a culture of respect, diversity, and inclusion. Responsibilities - The tasks of this position will relate mainly to charcter rigging, deformation, muscle, hair and clothe. - Providing general support for Art team and Design team. - Help setting up pipelines and writing tools to support them.
qualifications: Qualifications - A relevant degree or professional experience in the game industry as a Character TD. - Over 5 years of AAA production experience, and at least one AAA title credited and shipped. - An online portfolio showing relevant examples of your work. SKILLS - Advanced skill in skinning and rigging using Maya to deliver complex rig / tool set. - Multiple content development experiences (can be modeling, animation, shader, and VFX) - Good understanding of Unreal / Unity and related tools. - Strong artistic skills and working knowledge of 3D art production. - Good understanding of Python tool and pipeline development. - Communicates and collaborates effectively with the development team. - Strong problem solving and trouble-shooting skills. - Must be flexible and comfortable with prototyping and quick iteration. - An adaptable and continuous learner. - Fluent, In-depth handling Technical and Artistic of IK / FK rigging and skin weight skill. PLUSES - Experience in other scripting and programming languages (Python, Javascript, C++, etc. ). - Familiarity working and developing in a multi-platform, multi-project environment. - Understanding of developing pipelines and creating efficient user interfaces.

title: Senior Game Audio Programmer
responsibilities: 1. Responsible for participating in game audio integration, problem analysis, and solution. 2. Co-ordinating with the game audio designer and share responsibility for audio design and development. 3. Responsible for functional development and performance optimization of game audio middleware. 4. Frontier technology of game audio research and development.
qualifications: 1. Major in signal, multimedia technology, music, computer science, or other computer related field. Familiarity with C / C++ development. Having the capability of good coding habits and rich experience of programming. Preferably with experience in mobile or console game development. 2. Mastering the game audio interface, familiar with common audio function modules, familiar with the mechanism of any of third-party audio middleware, such as FMOD / Wwise / Criware. Have the capability of analyzing and solving problems quickly. 3. Familiar with the common designing methods of game sound effects and music, and mastered the use of game audio middleware. Preferably with the capability of game audio sound designing and familiarity with the usage and mechanism of DAW. 4. Familiar with game engines such as Unity and Unreal or any other internal game engine. Have knowledge of the game development process. Mastering the method and integration mode of game audio, and having the experience and ability of game plug-in development. 5. Having a basic knowledge of digital signal analysis, familiar with Matlab / Python and other scripting languages. Familiar with the framework of common audio signal analysis and processing methods. Preferably with experience in related audio effector implementation. 6. Better to have knowledge of PD, MAX / MSP, FAUST, and other graphics audio programming languages, having the capability to quickly conduct audio synthesis and prototype design of audio effect. 7. Better to have knowledge of the mechanism of spatial acoustics technology, have the capability of spatial acoustics technology application and algorithm design, preferably with relevant development experience. 8. Better to have knowledge of basic music theory, have certain musical literacy, familiar with the related synthesis technology of music or musical instruments is preferred. 9. Strong teamwork ability, learning ability, and team spirit.

title: Senior Systems Designer - Lightspeed LA
responsibilities: Senior Systems Designer (AAA Open World) Responsibilities As a Systems Designer at Lightspeed LA you will be responsible for designing and creating gameplay features, systems, and mechanics for a AAA open world game. You will brainstorm, prototype, implement, and fine tune deep game systems that are rewarding, easy to understand, and easy to use. You will collaborate closely with multidisciplinary teams to create memorable and engaging gameplay that aligns with the creative and holistic direction of the game. Required Skills - 5+ years of experience as a gameplay or systems designer - Communicate design functionality and vision through presentations, prototyping, and design documentation - Take a holistic approach to design rules and experiences with input and consideration from a multi-faceted team of contributors, including Tech, Design, UX, Art, etc. - Help develop in-game prototypes of gameplay systems and features and evaluate their performance - The ability and desire to work in an extremely creative and collaborative environment - Adapt to technical and production constraints, and be willing to iterate on your designs as often as needed throughout production - Critical thinking, open-mindedness, resourcefulness, and flexibility - Be an integral part of realizing solutions to fix bugs and problems within the implemented systems - Follow up on features pre and post launch to help improve, add, or remove components - Combine passion, skill, and expertise to continually raise the design bar - Experience designing gameplay features, mechanics and / or systems on at least one shipped title
qualifications: Preferred Qualifications - Strong knowledge of scripting languages - Analytical skills for evaluating systems and interpreting player behavior - Expertise in one or more of the following areas: user interface design, ambient systems, camera systems, progression systems, vehicle systems, AI systems, itemization, economy, or weapons - Possess an extensive knowledge of competing products and a deep understanding of the complex interdependencies of open world game systems - Experience with modern game engines and visual scripting (Unreal, Unity, etc. ) - A passion for mentoring designers and leading by example - Shipped at least one AAA game from inception to finish

title: Lead Gameplay Designer
responsibilities: Lead Gameplay Designer As a Lead Gameplay Designer, you will be responsible for designing and creating gameplay features, systems and mechanics that support and align with the creative and holistic direction of the game. Systems such as gameplay rules, control systems, camera systems, combat systems, progression systems, weapon attributes, collision systems, vehicles, artificial intelligence behaviors, etc. You should be very open to collaborating with not just other designers, but every member of the dev team. We're not necessarily looking for someone with lead experience but would have to have leadership potential. If you think this is you, then you should apply! As a Lead Gameplay Designer, you will: - Be the main person and point of contact for all things related to game mechanics, gameplay features, and gameplay system designs - Help build and lead the gameplay design team - Communicate design functionality and vision through presentations, prototyping, and design documentation - Collaborate with design leads to help realize and further develop the vision of the game - Collaborate with the leads of the different dev departments to integrate designs of features and mechanics - Take a holistic approach to design rules and experiences with input and consideration from a multi-faceted team of contributors, including Tech, UX, Art disciplines, etc. - Communicate the vision of the game to the game mechanics design team and be able to break down and translate that vision into tangible tasks on a regular basis - Exercise production skills to help set priorities and tasks for the gameplay mechanics design team and to deliver on those goals - Create and maintain design documentation that will serve as the guide to everyone throughout the entire dev team - Help develop in-game prototypes of gameplay systems and features and evaluate their performance - Adapt to technical and production constraints, and be willing to iterate on your designs as often as needed - Be an integral part of realizing solutions to fix bugs and problems within the implemented systems - Follow up on features pre and post launch to help improve, add, or remove components - Combine passion, skill and expertise to continually raise the design bar
qualifications: Qualifications - A college diploma in Game Design or equivalent - At least 5 years of experience in video game production or related experience - Experience with game engines - Unity and / or Unreal, and productivity software – Word, Excel, Photoshop - A passion for making and playing (a wide range of) video games - Extremely open to different and exciting design challenges - The ability and desire to work in an extremely creative and collaborative environment - Good communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills and the ability to clearly explain your thought process through documentation or in-person presentations - Critical thinking, open-mindedness, resourcefulness, and flexibility - Experience designing gameplay features, mechanics and / or systems on at least two shipped titles - Organizational and project management skills with the ability to multi-task a plethora of priorities - Bonus Skills: Design team leadership, Gameplay scripting experience

responsibilities: - Manage the full-cycle recruitment process from source to hire of technical and specialist game development candidates, providing outstanding partnership to internal stakeholders and best matching the needs of Lightspeed LA and the talent in the market. - Partner with multiple hiring managers to identify, engage and evaluate sourcing channels and recruit specialist talents. - Collaborate closely with our HR team and key stakeholders in designing, improving and developing HR and recruitment related processes for the studio.
qualifications: - 5+ years of recruitment experience, with 2+ years of experience in technical recruitment for game development roles. - Demonstrated experience in full cycle recruitment of engineering, high-level talent and specialist verticals. - Strong understanding of the game industry and talent landscape, keep up-to-date with industry trends. - Ability to adapt to a fast paced, multicultural work environment. Great teamwork spirit, strong communication skills, and fast-learning ability. - Strong analytical skills, proficiency in gathering and analyzing information, and ability to identify problems, pitch and implement solutions.

title: Lightspeed LA Studio - Senior / Lead Technical Designer
responsibilities: As a Technical Designer at Lightspeed LA, you will be the liaison between the Design and Engineering teams. You will be working with multi-disciplinary teams to optimize designer workflow, processes, content pipeline, and define best practices. You will engage in complex technical areas such as AI, physics, animation, UI, and data management. As part of the Design team, you will be the go-to person for the implementation of complex scripted content that stretches the capability of the design team.
qualifications: Required Skills 5+ years of proven game design and scripting experience in a professional environment. A strong desire for solving complex technical and creative problems A good understanding of object-oriented programming patterns. Assume responsibility for scripting intricate content and systems Set the bar for the design department’s implementation of scripted content Preferred Qualifications Technical Degree (CS, IT, SE, CE, or equivalent work experience) is a plus Multiple scripting and programming languages: one of Python / C / C++ / C# / Java to a reasonable knowledge Ability to drive problem solving by predicting problems, producing test cases, and implementing fixes in systems and tools Strong experience with Visual Scripting languages (Kismet, Blueprint, etc. ) A deep understanding of how open world systems affect gameplay

title: Lightspeed LA - Senior Producer
responsibilities: Responsibilities:  Build the game’s technical production roadmap, coordinating, scheduling and, working in close collaboration with the core game development team.  Create detailed documentation and plans and effectively communicate those with your teams to deliver on project objectives.  Responsible for ensuring product quality and design direction through each stage of the development process.  Actively seek and implement new ways to improve studio processes and workflow.
qualifications: Requirements:  Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, or equivalent software engineering / technical production experience.  At least 5 years’ experience working in the game industry with at least 3 years’ experience in technical production (with at least one project completed full-cycle as a producer or project manager).  Strong understanding of the game production pipeline and project management methodologies.  Experience in multi-platform AAA game development.  Strong understanding behind large-scale technical management resource and scheduling requirements.  Strong communication ability, passionate about gaming and building the best player experience.

title: 《一人之下》新3D手游高级3D游戏特效设计师(深圳)
responsibilities: 制作3DACT角色怪物技能特效，局内CG展示特效，场景特效与UI特效并输出引擎文件，负责完成与动画，策划，程序良好沟通和衔接。与UI，动画，程序配合调试效果，并能根据实际制作中汇总和归纳相关问题并处理。跟进外包进度并指导和审核外包。
qualifications: 美术类相关专业毕业，大专以上学历，有较优秀的色彩感和美术手绘功底，对运动规律和节奏有较深的认知，2年以上特效制作经验；熟悉3amax或者maya，PS，AE，unity，UE4，flash等软件，具有良好的团队合作意识。对游戏特效有一定的见解，并能实现完成。有创意，有想象力，热衷游戏行业。具备良好的合作精神，有较强的责任心和沟通能力，能承受一定工作压力。

title: Senior Gameplay Engineer - Lightspeed LA
responsibilities: Senior Gameplay Engineer LightSpeed LA is seeking for a talented and enthusiastic senior gameplay engineer to join our new studio in sunny Irvine California. The ideal candidate will have a strong passion for games and solving ambitious technical and creative problems. Join us and help build a team and culture of mutual respect and passion that pushes boundaries while having lots of fun! Responsibilities: - Design, implement, and support quality gameplay systems and tools - Collaborate directly and proactively with engineers, designers, artists, and QA to explore and identify needs and opportunities - Cultivate strong cross-disciplinary working relationships based on honesty and transparency - Author lean, high-performance, maintainable code - Actively profile and optimize the game's codebase - Participate in the testing and documentation of game systems and tools - Mentor, develop, and learn from colleagues - Help build and maintain an open and energetic team culture
qualifications: Requirements: - Passion and enthusiasm for creating fun and engaging gameplay through iteration and innovation - 5+ years of professional game programming experience - Experience bringing a AAA (or similar scope) game to completion on PC and Consoles - Deep knowledge of data structures, containers, and common algorithms - Track record of creating systems and tools that enable rapid iteration and debugging - Expert in C++, debugging, and 3D math - Enjoy working closely with creative and technical team members - Strong written and verbal communication skills - Value lean, simple, efficient, well-tested code Preferred: - Experience working with AAA engines - Experience with concurrency and multithreaded programming techniques - Experience with game console hardware - Deep knowledge of animation, physics, AI, and / or networking - Experience building or tuning playable vehicles

title: 26699-智慧零售行业方案经理(深圳 / 北京 / 上海)
responsibilities: 1. 根据重点行业（商超百货、购物中心、鞋服美妆、家居家电、食品饮料等）企业数字化转型需求，输出智慧零售行业解决方案，推进相应解决方案在客户项目中落地； 2. 对腾讯智慧零售、社交零售、私域流量、小程序电商运营的玩法，有深刻地理解和实践，能够站在零售客户的角度，去分析问题所在，跟客户讲同样的业务语言； 3. 通过短期的客户业务调研，能快速捕捉重点行业客户业务痛点，结合腾讯智慧零售核心产品能力，提出相应的定制解决方案，抓住项目合作机会； 4. 能够配合商务推进合适的商机，跟踪项目进展全过程，协同腾讯内部及腾讯生态的力量，积极促成双方合作并顺利项目落地； 5. 负责对接零售行业的需求进行分析、评估、总结行业客户诉求，基于对行业与客户需求的深入理解，为客户提供定制化解决方案，打造行业标杆。 6. 负责客户需求沟通、方案宣讲等工作，配合将客户需求整理成内部相关产品需求，反馈给产品团队，以便产品能进行相应的优化改进。
qualifications: 1. 工学本科以上学历，5年以上工作经验，有IT方案架构沟通能力； 2. 熟悉云计算、大数据、人工智能、广告业务相关技术，有零售企业数字化转型经验优先； 3. 全面的IT基础知识，包括中台、服务器、存储、网络、数据库、中间件、虚拟化、容器等方面； 4. 有方案设计、咨询能力，有技术文档撰写功底，优良的方案宣讲能力； 5. 善于与客户沟通，了解常见企业2B项目进展逻辑，有过投标过程经验； 6. 对零售行业信息化体系有理解，有相关行业最终用户和系统集成工作经历优先，有企业级中台、ERP、电商建站等类型的项目实践经验最佳； 7. 个性乐观、吃苦耐劳、抗压能力强，适应互联网行业勇于创新、快速变化的企业文化，适应频繁的出差。

title: 15570-gameplay客户端开发组长
responsibilities: 带团队负责游戏客户端业务的设计和开发，工作包括但不限于框架设计、开发编码和各类协作； 持续优化性能、需求表现和兼容性； 协同策划建立高效的游戏内容制作管线； 完善并持续优化工具链。
qualifications: 计算机相关专业，本科及以上学历； 5年以上游戏客户端研发经验或2年以上UE4引擎开发经验； 有优秀的软件工程功底与知识结构, 精通C / C++及常用脚本语言； 熟悉设计模式，数据结构和算法； 有优秀的学习能力，热爱游戏事业，良好的团队协作能力与敬业精神； 有手游项目研发管理经验。

title: CSIG17-腾讯云网络测试开发工程师（CSIG全资子公司）（武汉）
responsibilities: 你是网络大牛，热衷于专研云网络技术的奥秘；亦或是有技术热情的潜力派，希望揭开云网络的神秘面纱，那么欢迎加入腾讯云网络测试团队，我们致力于腾讯云IAAS层云网络的质量保障工作，为腾讯云提供强大、稳定的网络通讯服务，支撑云上海量业务。 在这里，你可以深入接触相关腾讯云网络产品，类如：私有网络、负载均衡、自定义防火墙、专线网络和NAT网关等； 在这里，你还可以深入运用并学习相关Overlay网络技术，类如：Vxlan、GRE、L2 / L3网络协议、IPSec、NAT原理、OSPF、BGP和ISIS等； 在这里，你还可以深入接触Linux下前沿网络流量转发技术，类如：DPDK、OVS、智能网卡、FPGA和P4等 在这里，你还可以深度参与腾讯云DevOps流程建设与相关运营工作，并且可以参与设计优化自动化测试框架进行相关自动化测试工作； 加入我们，与业内最优秀的同事并肩，成为网络测试大牛，见证云网络技术的发展，创造业务的一个个里程碑。 1) 负责腾讯云产品需求和架构分析，测试设计和测试开发工作，包括IaaS层如计算、网络和虚拟化等，包括但不限于功能测试，性能测试，可靠性测试，高可用测试，混沌测试，稳定性测试，用户体验等系统测试工作； 2) 对测试方案进行有效的落地和执行，以确保项目进度和质量，形成自动化测试用例并进一步形成服务化提升效率； 3) 架构并实现IaaS层如网络、虚拟化等产品自动化测试平台，提升产品测试和交付能力； 4)不断提升测试过程、方法和技术，构建质量评估标准，优化改进措施，提升产品质量和效率； 5）设计、构建并落地各产品自动化构建、测试和发布的工程基础设施和流程优化； 注：此岗位位腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制
qualifications: 1）计算机或软件相关专业，本科及以上学历，具备扎实的计算机和软件技术基础； 2）两年以上软件开发经验，能熟悉掌握和运用C / C++ / Python等任何一门主流编程语言； 3）在测试自动化、持续集成、静态分析、开发调试工具、框架设计和分布式系统等领域中，有涉及到一项或多项相关的实践经验； 4）满足以下条件者优先： - IAAS云平台测试经验如openstack等优先； - 云网络测试相关工作经验者优先，如：TCP / IP协议 / GRE / VXLAN / 组播 / 广播 / NFV / SDN / 防火墙等； 5）具备良好的团队合作精神，善于协调沟通，具备较强的问题定位和推动解决能力； 6）具备较强的抗压能力，能面对专有云项目的机遇与挑战，在较大压力下保持工作激情；

title: CSIG17-腾讯云网络测试开发工程师（CSIG全资子公司）（长沙）

title: 43451-ARPG资深战斗策划
responsibilities: 1、ARPG手游基础3C及战斗模块相关工作的设计参与和制作跟进； 2、独立的设计战斗职业，职业BD，并跟进制作 3、根据基础模块的整体构架&数值要求，主要参与3C及战斗模块，各种移动操作，各种战斗体验玩法、怪物AI、技能设定及表现力、特色系统的设计和制作等； 4、参与和支持战斗模块整体能力追求构架&平衡性测试。
qualifications: 1、有完整RPG或相关手游项目开发经验，至少3年以上战斗模块工作经验； 2、至少设计过2个完整的战斗角色或者职业 3、热爱游戏行业，游戏体验丰富，至少深入了解或研究过一两款大型MMORPG或开放世界RPG手游； 4、具备一定的数值理解能力或设计功底，对主流游戏的战斗模块&玩家能力构成形式、设计方法和体验乐趣都有一定的研究和心得(热衷战斗模块相关表现设计,动作类游戏体验丰富)； 5、易沟通、善沟通、逻辑思维、分析能力强。感染力强、勇于创新、有主见、能配合、能承担一定压力。

title: 15605-UC资深3D场景 / 地编美术师(热招)
responsibilities: 负责游戏内场景的制作，景观搭建和氛围营造，整体3D场景设计与把控； 设计游戏引擎内的3D场景灯光，制作静态光照效果； 推动项目3D场景技术的持续提升和优化； 审核外包提交的3D资源，并指导外包制作； 负责游戏资源输出，场景整合，场景呈现效率规划； 熟悉Unity引擎，有Unity项目经验者先。
qualifications: 美术功底扎实，熟练制作灯光效果，对气氛营造有深入的理解； 造型能力强，色感突出，注重场景物件塑造，具有丰富手绘以及次世代制作功底； 优秀的沟通能力，能清晰地表达，并出色地与外部伙伴协调合作。 有手游开发经验熟悉游戏引擎Unity者优先；具有3年以上3D游戏场景相关工作经验优先； 熟悉主流游戏美术风格并由相关经验，包括但不限于写实PBR，手绘风格化等等。 熟练使用Maya，3ds Max，Photoshop, Substance Painter等工具； 富有想象力和创新能力，热爱游戏，关注游戏体验，具有良好的沟通能力，积极主动解决问题，并能承受较强的工作压力，有责任心和较强的团队合作意识。

title: 56233-《UE4次世代PVE射击手游》-高级场景原画（广州）
responsibilities: 负责游戏内的场景POI规划，场景氛围图，场景单体和道具的创意设计工作； 负责场景和道具的相关宣传展示设计； 与3D以及其他设计师进行良好的沟通配合，跟进概念到资源落地的制作流程； 负责拆解设计需求，引导外包CP，完成设计目标。
qualifications: 5年以上游戏行业相关工作经验； 热爱游戏，并对ACG有较深的关注度，对不同风格和媒介中的美术共通性有一定的理解和转换能力； 具备扎实的的游戏美术基础，对透视、配色、造型等有深入理解及熟练的表现技法； 有一定的军事知识积累，能基于现实的场景和道具做合理的再设计，细节符合游戏逻辑； 对FPS富有激情，良好的团队合作精神，沟通能力好，责任心强。

title: 安全产品交付架构师（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1. 负责里约网关、SOC项目技术架构设计、实施，确保项目成功落地； 2. 负责整体解决方案的需求分析，完成技术选型，基础架构设计，业务监控设计，交付方案撰写； 3. 指导一线团队进行交付实施，保证交付的技术架构和产品质量； 4. 主持攻坚解决各种疑难技术问题、系统性能优化、高可用、容灾架构设计，推动跨部门合作，推动架构和产品优化； 5. 抽象交付过程中的业务场景、技术问题并进行定义，制定最佳的技术架构和技术方案，沉淀交付方案并提高交付效率。

title: 56233-《UE4次世代PVP射击手游》高级客户端开发工程师 （深圳）
responsibilities: 负责游戏中的模块设计与开发，根据需求制定合理技术方案并实现； 负责游戏中的关键技术预研，有较强的学习和深入能力，能进行方案选型； 负责游戏中的性能优化相关工作，分析、定位并解决性能问题； 负责游戏中的工具扩展，优化工具链及工作流； 负责游戏中的各类问题的跟进与解决。
qualifications: 熟悉UE4开发，有2年及以上游戏开发经验； 熟练使用C++，熟悉TypeScript、Lua等脚本语言，基础扎实； 在引擎特性使用（如动画、渲染）、Gameplay开发、性能优化、编辑器扩展等某一领域有丰富经验； 具备良好的沟通能力，优秀的学习能力，善于分析问题、解决问题； 责任心强，对游戏技术有追求； 有基于UE4的项目优化经验者优先； 热爱游戏事业，对FPS游戏熟悉和热爱者优先。

column1: 2）面向能源行业，不少于8年或以上的相关从业经验，熟悉该行业内的人和事；
3）主导过较大型项目的招投标工作和内外部合作；
4）有合作伙伴拓展和渠道管理的经验，在情况复杂的情况下开展工作的经验；
5）IT及云产品方面的知识储备；对于云计算、大数据、AI、互联网营销、区块链等有清晰的了解和认识，对于传统企业领域的技术和方案要有深刻的理解；
6）思维逻辑清晰，敏锐的市场洞察力，强自我驱动力和执行力；
7）能够适应较为频繁的出差； 通过腾讯云技术认证或同等资格认证的优先录取。 通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取

title: 47470-腾讯云技术规划架构师-H
responsibilities: 1、负责腾讯云PaaS / SaaS产品的技术架构分析与对比，深入剖析技术细节，挖掘成本优化空间； 2、负责研究公有云海量集群的弹性调度方案、规划运营效能提升路径，联合产研制定降本增效方案； 3、参与跨事业群、跨部门的联合项目管理工作。
qualifications: 岗位要求 1、计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，5年以上互联网产品或云计算平台的后台开发经验； 2、熟练使用Python / C++ / Java等语言，对软硬件性能优化有深入理解； 3、工作踏实、积极主动、能够承受一定的工作压力； 4、具有良好的分析、研究和解决问题能力，具备较强的沟通表达、团队协作和项目管理能力； 5、技术能力符合以下其中一项的： 1）云原生方向：熟悉Docker、Kubernetes底层技术，有云原生架构设计或Serverless应用开发经验； 2）大数据方向：有Elasticsearch、MapReduce、ClickHouse等大数据组件的开发或使用经验； 3）数据库方向：对MySQL、Redis等数据库的架构及应用场景有深入的实践或调优经验； 4）音视频方向：熟练掌握视频、流媒体常见的协议(如HTTP / RTSP / RTP / HLS / RTMP / FLV等)，熟悉音视频编解码技术、有CDN / 直播 / 点播等系统的研发或运维经验； 5）有高并发、高可靠、大规模的后台服务系统架构设计经验。

title: 47470-腾讯云成本管理专家
responsibilities: 岗位职责 1、负责腾讯云成本管理模型与方法的体系设计； 2、负责云计算行业的成本分析、成本优化与成本战略工作； 3、负责云计算产品优化目标的制定，并推动执行落地。
qualifications: 岗位要求 1、本科及以上学历，8年以上成本管理或战略管理咨询，具备云计算或者信息化领域工作经验； 2、有在大型互联网或IT企业，从事成本领域的管理或咨询、具备丰富的成本管理与损益管理经验 3、敏锐的数据洞察力、严谨的逻辑思维能力，善于分析、归纳、解决问题，并能量化数据建模； 4、掌握专业的市场分析和战略研究的方法论，主导过较大型项目的工作和内外部合作，有丰富的跨团队合作经验； 5、工作踏实、积极主动、能够承受一定的工作压力。

title: 40164-NXS 3D游戏动画设计(上海)
responsibilities: 负责角色及机械动画制作的工作； 需要配合策划，运营，模型，原画，特效等环节协同完成动画整体的工作；
qualifications: 2年以上工作经验； 参与过完整3D项目开发； 熟练使用工作软件3dmax等，对UNITY3D熟悉，有UE4开发经验者优先； 有较好的美术功底，热爱游戏，对ACG敏感，喜爱日系动画，适应二次元动画制作； 有手绘动画功底者优先； 追求卓越，注重团队合作，具备一定的抗压能力。

title: 40164-NXS 2D角色原画设计师(上海)
responsibilities: 配合项目主美术制定游戏角色风格定位； 负责项目高品质角色原画输出表现； 负责人物的服装武器道具等设计； 负责跟进版本内实现的效果； 负责协同外部画师跟进工作，把控品质。
qualifications: 三年以上游戏美术工作经验，有3D游戏开发经验； 有敏锐的色彩感觉较强审美能力扎实美术基础和原画设计能力； 能够针对项目世界观作出有辨识度的设计和设计理念呈现； 有一定的分镜设计能力，具备镜头设计的叙事能力； 能对竞品进行美术表现分析和借鉴，对游戏风格和设计的结合有深刻见解； 熟练运用相关软件； ACG领域有资深经验，并对业界新风格始终保持敏感，热爱影视，游戏，动画等，具备良好的团队合作和沟通能力，责任感强，积极进取。

title: 41299-UE4 Gameplay高级工程师
responsibilities: - 针对gameplay需求进行框架及功能设计； - 实现稳定、可维护、可重用的功能，并提供相应的编辑、检查、性能优化、自动测试等完整解决方案； - 针对gameplay系统的痛点问题，主动研究并提出技术方案进行解决，例如3C、Game AI、 同步等问题； - 针对技能效果、网络同步效果、性能等gameplay基础模块进行深度优化； - 对gameplay功能进行抽象以便形成中台能力，为其他项目所用；
qualifications: - 扎实的编程基础，过硬的C++编程能力； - 具有UE4或者Unity引擎使用经验（UE4优先）； - 具备以下一个或者多个gameplay相关模块的长期深入开发经验：3C以及复杂地形下的玩家移动、技能系统、玩法模式架构、游戏AI、关卡玩法、netcode同步策略等； - 具有支持系统的相关编辑器功能的开发经验； - 具有丰富的gameplay相关系统的性能优化经验； - 良好的团队协作能力，善于沟通；

title: 31498-Senior 3D Rendering Engineer
responsibilities: Mission: Engaged in the research and development of multi-platform AAA-level game rendering technology for PC, Consoles, and Mobile devices. You will work on implementing advanced rendering techniques on mobile platforms to improve visual quality while maintaining high performance and low power consumption. You should participate in cross-project collaboration, knowledge sharing, and coaching less experienced engineers. You may also need to help projects under development out by providing technical advice / solution.
qualifications: What you should be equipped with: Extensive computer science / engineering knowledge or equivalent. Proven work experience in general game programming and 3D rendering programming. At least one console or PC AAA title shipped. Solid mathematical foundation; excellent C / C++ programming ability; In-depth understanding of current graphics hardware and API; GPU computing experience; Expertise in performance optimization of game Consoles and / or PCs and / or mobile devices; Multithreaded programming expertise At least 8 years of experience in video game development; Passion, creativity and resourcefulness; The ability to adapt to change; Good communication skills; Experience with Unreal Engine is preferred.

title: TEG03-编译器开发工程师（长沙）（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1 Kona JDK、Python虚拟机支持云上付费维保产品化，云产品JDK组件支撑。 2. 承担Linux、Win、Mac等平台编译打包和测试等技术工作 3. ARM等CPU架构ARCH和特性支持的开发与测试。 4. 围绕腾讯规模数据中心、开发场景和云场景，打造业界领先的编译器 / 虚拟机产品，作为国内持续OpenJDK等社区贡献第一的团队，参与腾讯Kona JDK和Python虚拟机等开发、测试和社区贡献；
qualifications: 1 扎实的计算机科学基本功，尤其是数据结构、编译原理、操作系统等。 2 熟练掌握C / C++或Java、Python、go等一种或以上编程语言。 3 OpenJDK、Python虚拟机、gcc / llvm等开发或测试经验优先。 4 掌握内核、调试工具、系统性能分析工具经验是加分项。 5 有ARM、x86等指令架构经验是加分项。

title: TEG03-大数据平台开发2（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1. 负责大数据(数据湖、实时数仓等)解决方案及各类行业场景验证与落地。 2. 负责大数据应用产品研发。 3. 负责大数据组件性能优化与运营能力建设。
qualifications: 1. 本科以上学历，计算机或相关专业；3年以上Linux后台开发经验，有大规模系统开发经验；精通HTTP、TCP / IP协议，网络编程；熟悉Linux操作系统原理，常用工具；有高并发、大容量后台服务系统设计经验； 2. 熟悉常用大数据开源组件； 3. 具有良好的学习能力、沟通能力、团队合作意识；强烈的责任心与主动性，对所负责工作有owner意识，并能自我驱动成长； 4. 对Hadoop、Flink、Spark、Kafka、Lucene等开源项目有大规模应用经验 5. 熟悉spring cloud、k8s；对微服务，服务治理或者service mesh有经验加分。 5. 熟悉spring cloud、k8s；对微服务，服务治理或者service mesh有经验加分。

title: 游戏客户端开发工程师（引擎方向）
responsibilities: 负责基于UE引擎的客户端开发，为游戏AI工具在游戏端上的应用提供引擎层面的定制化和组件扩展能力; 负责游戏产品需求的技术可行性评估和技术方案的设计实现、核心功能和核心模块开发、游戏引擎开发和性能优化、游戏相关的工具链开发。
qualifications: 三年以上游戏客户端开发经验，至少参与过一款3D游戏项目，对游戏研发技术领域有较为全面的了解和关注； 丰富的Unity或UE引擎实践经验，熟悉其框架和主要模块功能特性，深度使用过UE进行过大项目开发，有开放世界项目经验优先; 对UE引擎有定制化和扩展经验，有实际的二次开发和维护经验。在渲染，动画，物理，场景，性能，资源管理等其中某一技术领域有丰富经验; 熟悉软件研发领域知识(计算机系统、OS、数据结构等)，熟练使用C#, lua, C / C++，熟悉PC / 移动端 / 微信小游戏等游戏平台的游戏开发; 出色的学习能力，良好的问题分析解决能力； 责任心强，有较高的团队协作和任务跟进能力，善于沟通，使命必达； 热爱游戏，关注用户体验; 对人工职能（AI）技术在游戏内的应用有实践经验或有自己独到的理解，充满好奇心的优先。

title: 机器学习平台高级开发工程师（深圳 / 北京)
responsibilities: 1. 负责大规模机器学习平台研发，全栈功能包括特征工程、模型训练、在线推理、MLOps，面向业务算法工程师，完善平台功能，提高系统稳定性，优化效率等； 2. 提升平台易用性优化，提供可视化操作界面和丰富的API接口，降低AI应用门槛； 3. 积极追踪AI领域动态，不断推进AI架构升级，持续演进平台产品。
qualifications: 1. 具有良好的软件设计和开发能力，熟练使用Java、Python、Go等一种或多种语言； 2. 熟悉Spring Boot、MySQL、K8S、Docker等应用开发组件 / 框架； 3. 具有Web应用开发经验，尤其在分布式、高可用、高并发等领域； 4. 了解TF / Pytorch等机器学习框架，了解模型训练、模型推理等基础概念； 5. 良好的沟通能力、团队协作意识。

title: NLP算法高级研究员（游戏AI）
responsibilities: 1. 负责智能NPC中对话技术和多模态交互等前沿技术研究和能力建设 2. 根据实际应用效果不断改进模型和算法，实现前沿自然语言处理技术、对话技术、多模态技术在游戏、数字人等相关业务上的应用和落地； 3. 跟踪业界最新研究成果，提升团队在自然语言处理和多模态交互算法方面的技术积累；
qualifications: 1. 计算机相关专业，硕士及以上； 2. 具有扎实的机器学习基础，在对话生成、KBQA、FAQ、情感分析、意图识别等一个或多个领域中有实战经验，熟悉NLP领域的常用方法，有BERT, transformer, GPT等深度学习经验； 3. 具有优秀的编码能力, 有扎实的数据结构和算法功底，熟悉常见的深度学习框架 (如tensorflow、pytorch)； 4. 具有优秀的分析问题和解决问题的能力，有激情，敢于接受具有挑战性的事情；

title: CSIG17-云Paas测试工程师(CSIG全资子公司)(武汉 / 西安 / 长沙)
responsibilities: 1、负责腾讯云paas相关产品(CDN、边缘计算、物联网等)的全流程质量管控工作，包括参与需求分析，帮助完善需求与开发设计实现，合理设计测试计划，实施测试活动，跟进缺陷，协助研发分析定位问题； 2、负责产品相关的测试方案，测试工具平台设计及实现工作； 3、保证被测系统的质量，并通过测试流程和方法创新，提升研发的质量和效率。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位
qualifications: 1、计算机本科及以上相关专业2年以上工作经验； 2、对计算机网络等计算机和软件基础有比较深入的理解和实践经验； 3、熟练掌握C / C++ / Go等至少一种编程语言或者对Python / Shell / Perl等至少一门脚本语言有丰富实践经历； 4、对云计算有经验和丰富实践者优先； 5、具备良好的团队合作精神，善于协调沟通，具备较高的问题推动解决能力。

title: TiMi F1 Montreal – Senior Gameplay Programmer
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Senior Gameplay Programmer who is eager to create a new AAA multi-platform game for gaming communities around the world. We are a new team within TiMi who is ambitiously looking to make massive, open world games for gamers to play for years to come. We are passionate about creating new, compelling worlds to play in and explore. Are you someone who is engaged with building new worlds, understands what captivates players, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium? Are you ready to channel your passion and energy into creating expansive open world games for global audiences? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor. Responsibilities Share a passion to innovate, especially in the design and development of open world games Define architecture networked player movement and interactions Create player controls and input that are easy to tune and fun for the player Build core gameplay systems such as weapon functionality, vehicle tuning, and player abilities You will be working on both client and server architecture, owning parts but willing to contribute to all aspects of the game Develop a set of good practices and guidelines for designers Write clear, maintainable, portable code that adheres to a well-documented coding standard Lead by example: demonstrate a willingness to give and receive feedback, collaborate with others to share techniques and ideas, and contribute to a positive working environment
qualifications: At least 6 years of professional AAA game development experience At least 1 AAA open world titles shipped, during the current generation of video games (PS4 / XBOX ONE) Experience optimizing a game network layer with code and by adjusting features to better fit networking limitations Knowledgeable about replication strategies and techniques Knowledgeable about client side prediction, accurate hit registration and strategies to mitigate poor latency and network conditions in multiplayer games Proficiency with C, C++ Excellent debugging and optimizing skills Ability to quickly prototype and iterate in collaboration with others Self-directed, taking initiative to drive progress Strong communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills Experience developing and sustaining live games and services What is in it for you? Create AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: Bring incredible game ideas to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world. TiMi has developed some of the most popular games worldwide and is looking for talented individuals to join it in making another major hit. Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team. Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: Join a team who cares about innovation and wants to delight players with new creative game design for open world experiences. Help create the next great game world for players to immerse in for decades to come.

title: TiMi F1 Montreal – Senior Technical Artist (UE generalist)
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Senior Technical Artist who is ready to lead and help create a new AAA multi-platform game for gaming communities around the world. We are a new team within TiMi who is ambitiously looking to make massive, open world games for gamers to play for years to come. We are passionate about creating new, compelling worlds to play in and explore. Are you someone who is engaged with building new worlds, understands what captivates players, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor. Responsibilities Share a passion to innovate, especially in the design and development of open world games Research and develop tools for aiding AAA game art development. Familiar with and have researched game engines Responsible for fully understanding all aspects of game art requirements and problems and providing adequate technical support and solutions. Familiar with game engine tool development Responsible for reaching better game art results and creating timely and effective technical research Responsible for effectively communicating with developers to improve game efficiency and performance, overall appearance in high / mid / low configuration and reducing low performance thresholds
qualifications: What we’re looking for? Strong Unreal Engine generalist with added exposure to character creation pipelines At least six years of professional AAA game development experience At least two AAA titles shipped in the current generation of consoles. Preferably with Unreal Engine. Solid understanding of Unreal Engine Toolchain & Ecosystem including (but not limited to) - Blueprints, Materials, Character / Animation Blueprints, Interoperability with DCC apps, Niagara . . . Experience and / or knowledge of some of the following: Scripting languages (Python, C#); 3D and 2D software (3DSMax / Maya / Blender, Photoshop, Substance, ZBrush); Shaders Excellent understanding of art content production, integration and validation Team player, highly collaborative and results oriented Good communication and presentation skills Autonomous and proactive to develop highly efficient solutions Curious about learning and implementing new technologies based on industry trends Bonus Qualifications Experience with Characters Modeling / Shading / Texturing Pipeline a huge bonus Understanding of character and animation systems within Unreal or any other game engines - Rigs, Blending Trees, Layering, Sequencer, Blueprints, Retargeting, State machines. . . , in-game physics (hair, cloth) A portfolio or blog / articles demonstrating any of the above What is in it for you? Create AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: Bring incredible game ideas to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world. TiMi has developed some of the most popular games worldwide and is looking for talented individuals to join it in making another major hit. Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team. Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: Join a team who cares about innovation and wants to delight players with new creative game design for open world experiences. Help create the next great game world for players to immerse in for decades to come.

qualifications: 1、以Linux为主，深入了解Linux下的网络架构编程，需要对Win / Mac / Android / Ios相关网络架构有较好了解； 2、熟练掌握Go语言、熟悉Go协程、channel和锁等； 3、熟悉分布式系统相关技术，如分布式缓存（redis）、消息队列（kafka）等中间件； 4、熟悉linux网络设置，熟悉TCP / IP等网络协议； 5、熟练掌握mysql等主流数据库的使用、精通SQL语言和优化、熟悉redis / mq / 缓存技术 / 主流微服务框架原理； 6、3年及以上相关开发经验； 7、对于常见的认证授权协议流程（例如OAuth2，CAS，SAML，LDAP等）有了解，有相关开发经验优先； 8、熟悉k8s使用及原理优先。

title: 零信任Android开发工程师（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1、移动安全加固产品Android端的升级研发； 2、移动安全加固产品Android端维护和适配工作； 3、移动安全风险检测等相关开发，Android方向。
qualifications: 1、本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业； 2、了解Android系统整体架构与四大组件相关知识； 3、了解apk启动流程与运行流程； 4、了解elf文件格式及linker工作方式； 5、有Android应用漏洞知识优先； 6、有安全相关从业经验，熟悉安全产品的工作原理优先。

title: 腾讯智能平台交互设计师（腾讯全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1、 负责腾讯智能平台-智能客服、智能分析及增长等产品的交互设计。 2、 参与产品规划、客户需求挖掘及用户行为研究，跟进产品需求制定的整个过程，提出设计目标并推动实施; 3、 对业务进行深入的思考洞察并提炼沉淀设计标准化与设计方法论，助力业务及设计团队提质提效。 备注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位
qualifications: 1、 本科及以上学历，2年以上交互设计经验，有B端中后台成功案例者优先。 2、 专业知识扎实，对B端产品趋势敏感，熟练各类设计软件工具，能独立完成高质量的交互方案及体验框架。 3、 具备敏锐的洞察力，逻辑思维严谨清晰，擅长行业及用户分析，从数据中挖掘体验机会点。 4、 对工作富有激情和责任感，业务理解力与沟通表达能力强，具备良好的团队协作精神。

qualifications: 1. 本科及以上学历，2年以上PC+移动产品设计经验并有成功案例，需提供能够展示面试者能力的作品集； 2. 逻辑思维严谨清晰，善于分析用户行为和场景并沉淀出相应的设计方法； 3. 具备敏锐的洞察力和审美力，富有好奇心并能够持续学习，对 B 端产品充满热情且对行业场景有较深的的理解； 4. 熟练运用各类设计方法和工具，通过高质量的设计原型清晰的表达设计理念； 5. 极为出色的沟通表达能力，能够有效的建立合作信任关系； 6. 独立思考，具备一定的项目管理和抗压能力。

responsibilities: 1、负责腾讯云国际版及ToB相关产品的的日常版本测试工作，深度参与需求分析，用例设计和评审，测试执行及缺陷跟进等，可测性及风险质量评估，测试计划和方案输出等工作，保障项目按时高质量交付； 2、参与项目测试体系建设和研发质量效率提升的工作，如开发自动化测试用例、开发测试工具等。 3、不断提升测试过程，方法和技术，构建质量评估体系，优化改进实施，提升产品质量和效率
qualifications: 1、本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，3年及以上测试工作经验，掌握常用测试理论与测试方法，设计高质量测试用例，帮助项目团队提升交付质量； 2、至少掌握一门编程语言(如python)，熟练使用go语言者优先； 3、掌握自动化测试思想，有自动化测试经验优先 4、有丰富的质量管理行业知识，能够根据项目节奏和阶段，给出最佳测试方案并执行 5、有较强的责任意识、主动性和执行能力，良好的沟通，表达和理解能力 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位

responsibilities: 1、 负责操作系统基础软件源码维护，需求开发，上游反馈等 2、负责操作系统核心组件设计和研发，腾讯自研软件开发和支持 3、负责软件包分析，打包和编译，软件包依赖解决 4、参与社区互动，协同开发，开发者交流等

responsibilities: 1、 负责基础系统的开发，如OBS构建系统，软件源，自动化测试系统及镜像构建系统等； 2、负责工具开发，包括安装工具，配置工具，检查修复类工具，备份还原工具等 3、负责运营管理类系统开发，如监控系统，性能分析和调优系统等 4、负责对外发布系统建设，如安全通告系统，缺陷跟踪系统，产品官网等

title: 高级商务投资经理-游戏方向 （上海）
responsibilities: 1、 负责国内游戏市场的商务拓展及合作项目的谈判，包括游戏授权、投资和其他合作机会； 2、能独立主导相关投资业务，包含投前分析以及投后的资产管理，与内部团队合作，确保项目管理和签署交易的顺利执行； 3、负责腾讯游戏重要合作伙伴的关系维护，并持续挖掘新的业务合作机会； 4、探索游戏行业上下游领域的新模式和机会，提供战略洞察和分析。

qualifications: 大专及以上学历，美术或设计相关专业毕业，3年及以上游戏界面视觉设计工作经验，有至少1个完整游戏项目研发经历； 熟练使用PS等相关设计软件，具备进行多种风格的视觉设计及落地能力，具备交互意识、3D制作、动态设计、引擎使用经验者优先考虑； 具备优秀的平面设计能力及绘制能力，对字体、构成、色彩、图形、质感、造型及动态效果有很好的把控力； 具备良好的整体把控能力和大局观，同时也能关注细节，并且注重最终的落地效果； 有良好的审美能力，关注当下的设计、美术、动态设计趋势； 具备良好的沟通和团队合作能力，热爱游戏，关注用户体验，有创新精神； 能提供界面视觉设计相关作品。

responsibilities: 负责手游项目开发管理，确保项目各团队高效协同工作； 负责迭代版本计划的制定、迭代开发跟踪、风险监控，确保迭代开发按计划、高质量的完成； 负责制定开发流程规范，梳理开发各环节工作范围和责任，确保开发有序推进； 负责制定工作制度，切实的执行例会、周会、周报、版本review等内容； 负责项目资源的合理安排及协调，与团队紧密沟通、解决开发过程中的问题，有效管理开发进度风险； 负责海外版本的开发计划协调与沟通。

responsibilities: 1. 直接对接腾讯云泛互行业头部SVIP客户，为客户提供直接、优质、专业的技术服务，维系客户及支持客户的持续高速发展； 2. 理解互联网企业在研发、运营工作中对网络、计算、存储等基础设施的需求，分析其快速发展过程中，在基础设施层面所遇到的挑战和未来的方向，并基于腾讯云的能力，赋能于客户，支持客户； 3. 在持续服务中，挖掘 / 获得客户在腾讯云上的新增长点，并组织方案，和产研及相关支持团队紧密协作，逐个落地； 4. 负责SAAS、PAAS等生态产品在客户场景中的持续进入，支持客户业务发展，增强客户对腾讯云的粘性。
qualifications: 1. 本科以上学历，5年以上互联网产品运维或开发或系统架构设计工作经验；  2. 熟悉服务器虚拟化技术及常见的云计算框架，例如：KVM，Xen，Openstack等； 熟悉负载均衡、各类VPN网关（支持IPsec、SSL等）、路由器等网络产品；  3. 熟悉数据库相关产品，如mysql \ sqlserver \ Redis \ MongoDB；  4. 熟悉公有云产品和服务体系，包括Iaas、Paas和Saas相关产品； 5. 熟悉自建网络、服务器、存储、IDC相关内容和方案；  6. 熟悉某一领域互联网产品（如游戏、电商、视频、物流、出行等）的技术体系、了解知名互联网公司典型产品的技术架构；  7. 具备与客户的CEO,CTO、运维负责人等关键人员的沟通能力和技巧。 通过腾讯云技术认证或同等资格认证的优先录取。 8. 极强的问题解决能力，习惯于寻找创新方法来达成目标；  9. 优良的客户服务意识，严谨的工作态度和强烈的责任心。 通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取

title: 31506-研发高级项目经理
responsibilities: 1. 负责产品线研发项目管理以及重点攻坚项目的研发项目管理工作； 2. 纵向以支持产品线收入突破按时高质量打造卓越产品为目标，建立产品线从客户需求及问题处理、到产研规划、项目开发、测试、打磨以及发布的全过程管理； 3. 横向负责建立产品线PMO研发规范、流程制定、落地推动、从而提升研发与前场各角色的握手机制的落地执行，达到客户满意度提升，研发高效有节奏地打造卓越产品的目的； 4. 要求具备丰富的toB端研发项目管理经验，有丰富的沟通协调能力以解决客户侧需求到产研规划各角色之间的人财物等各类问题； 5. 有丰富的经验以建立整体管理机制以及各个环节的标准、规范、流程、落地机制、质量和效率提升的度量以及推动团队文化建设； 6. 执行力强，抗压能力强，能有效分解工作，将多而杂的工作高效率分解提炼，通过有效的管理方法和工具，化繁为简，提升整体效率；
qualifications: 1. 5年以上toB项目管理工作经验； 2. 有专业的项目管理理论基础和基于自身实践的方法论 / 方法体系，熟悉研发管理体系标准、规范、流程、机制建设，有丰富的落地经验； 3. 曾负责大规模研发团队项目管理、项目群、项目集、项目组合管理等； 4. 目标感强，有独立思考和判断能力、执行力强、不墨守成规、个人影响力强； 5. 勇于探索和创新管理方法，擅长挖掘和构建项目管理工具、平台、流程以及规范； 6. 工作态度积极主动，自信阳光，抗压能力强，不怕困难，敢于担当。

title: IEG - Game Operation Manager
responsibilities: Responsibilities * Analyse player data and competitive data sets to understand the behavior of the current player base in the context of the marketplace. * Be able to plan active-themed events of local festivals based on LATAM local preferences and culture, design and follow up the launch of active events, output effective analysis, and summary, and continuously adjust optimization direction. * Be able to design and output localization proposals such as in-game features, worldview and related resources based on LATAM local preferences and culture. * According to the regional user behavior, able to coordinate with marketing and community teams to set plans for collaboration events, and reward resources investment and production. * Be familiar with local user preferences and MOBA game genres and output systematic and implementable proposals for the product's gameplays * Responsible for planning and organizing local offline user research, implementing the research plan, and summarizing effective user research conclusions.
qualifications: Essential Skills & Experience * More than 3 years of relevant working experience in-game event operations. * Understand each module of game operation, and be familiar with the design, configuration, testing, release, and other processes of mobile games R&D operation and events * Strong coordination and communication skills, active thinking, drive for innovation, and good at capturing marketing trends. * Passion for gaming, be familiar with the MOBA genre. Good teamwork, strong communication skills, and ability to work proactively under pressure. Have a strong sense of ownership. * Excellent analytical skills and the ability to summarise data into clear & tangible recommendations. * English language proficiency. * Proactive and approachable personality that thrives in a dynamic team environment.

title: 91933 - Procurement Risk Manager
responsibilities: 1. Perform process assessments of procurement functions for the company, and provide optimization suggestions or plans. 2. Prepare and deliver supplier report. 3. Set up and develop cost analysis models for all categories and evaluate price bench mark. 4. Responsible for compliance audit of company supplier, and conduct periodic onsite inspections on existing suppliers. 5. Lead to issue procurement-related internal control standards and policies. Provide professional advice for procurement consultations from business departments. Contribute to key procurement projects regarding risk and other support. 6. In charge of procurement procedure reviews, identify potential risks and offer controlling solutions or strategies. 7. Work on continuous optimization of procurement procedures and drive cost saving. 8. Coordinate with Audit Team to define the parts to be improved that identified in internal audit projects, follow up and report the improvement progress. 9. Promote the business staffs' awareness of procurement risks and cost control through public education and trainings.
qualifications: 1. Bachelor degree or above. 2. A minimum of 5 years’ work experience in marketing procurement or professional procurement consulting. 3. Deep understanding of procurement philosophy and solid knowledge of procurement process as well as e experience in methodologies and practice in cost control. 4. Can work independently with strong project ability. 5. Excellent demonstration in team work, strong organizational and communication skills. Advanced skills in Office contents compiling and reporting. 6. Excellent communications skills in English 7. Familiar with corporate risks. Possess solid experience in Internal Control, Audit or Financial Review. COSO background preferred. 8. Applicants with procurement certifications, CIA, CPA, CERM etc. and internet Industry working experience preferred.

title: 41069-金融云金融科技架构师-技术方向（北 / 上 / 深）
responsibilities: 作为金融云架构师，为泛金融行业客户和合作伙伴提供云服务业务及技术架构咨询服务，根据腾讯云的实际情况，结合行业发展趋势，制定面向泛金融行业的、有竞争力的金融科技解决方案； 根据客户业务的需求和理解合作伙伴的需求，基于腾讯金融云的整体架构，输出满足客户需求的服务解决方案； 负责泛金融项目的需求分析、方案设计、传统解决方案云化规划设计、应用迁移和数据迁移等设计工作； 支持业务团队进行售前工作，并配合相关的售中 / 售后等相关业务工作； 在客户迁云过程中，根据项目本身的需要，协助研发团队或实施团队（客户 \ 合作伙伴 \ 交付经理）完成Demo系统搭建，PoC测试及最终迁移工作； 负责上云案例、技术方案的更新维护，以及布道工作。 在客户迁云过程中，根据项目本身的需要，协助研发团队或实施团队（客户 \ 合作伙伴 \ 交付经理）完成Demo系统搭建，PoC测试及最终迁移工作； 负责上云案例、技术方案的更新维护，以及布道工作。
qualifications: 1、本科以上学历，5年的金融行业IT系统架构设计，2年以上云计算相关的架构设计工作经验； 2、熟悉典型的云服务体系和模式，熟悉业界典型的云架构、kvm虚拟化技术、虚拟网络技术、分布式存储技术、关系型数据库，如mysql \ sqlserver以及非关系型数据库，如Redis \ MongoDB、负载均衡等； 熟悉云平台系统的维护管理技术； 3、熟悉互联网金融业务架构、技术架构，了解监管要求及行业发展趋势； 熟悉互联网分布式架构； 4、具有一定IT Infrastructure（包含IDC，服务器、存储、数据库、网络、中间件）的运维或管理经验； 5、具备优秀的文档能力，清晰明了地表达架构意图，能够熟练编写各类技术文档； 具备良好的沟通、协调及资源整合能力； 6、具有丰富的金融客户架构设计或云服务集成实施、金融行业咨询经验优先； 7、其它补充要求： 具备较强的沟通交流能力和高度的团队合作精神，具备较强组织协调能力； 极强的问题解决能力，习惯于寻找创新方法来达成目标； 学习能力强，抗压能力强，需要并行支持多个项目。

title: 54876-Senior Researcher
responsibilities: Tencent Games Global Publishing Technology Centre (PTC) is building the leading platforms for game development, publishing, and operation. It has an exciting opportunity for a Natural Language Processing (NLP) Researcher. The ideal candidate will have experience and interest in the use of Natural Language Processing techniques to solve problems targeting multilingual text understanding tasks, especially tasks related to multilingual sentiment analysis including sentence-level and aspect-level. The candidate will have the opportunity to work with other top research scientists and research engineers to research and develop the market intelligence and public opinion services for Tencent's global games. There is also the opportunity to publish papers at top-tier conferences and journals. This position is a great fit for candidates with research and engineering who want to be at the cutting edge of research on multilingual natural language processing, and at the same time have direct real-world impact. Responsibilities 1. Exploring multilingual aspect-level and sentence-level sentiment analysis techniques for developing the market intelligence and public opinion services for Tencent's global games. 2. Research on multilingual sentiment analysis algorithms and follow up with the latest researches to iterate the models behind the scene. 3. Working closely with other team members to explore the cutting edge of research on multilingual natural language processing.
qualifications: 1. Master or PhD degree in Computer Science, mathematics, statistics, or similar area. Ph. D. with Strong publication record is preferred. 2. 5+ years of experience of building multilingual natural language processing models for business application. 3. Expert in multilingual sentiment analysis including sentence-level and aspect-level. 4. Familiar with deep learning applications and experienced with deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Caffe, PyTorch or Mxnet.

qualifications: 基本要求： 1、大学本科以上学历，计算机或相关专业；5年以上集团客户IT项目建设经验； 2、深入理解数字化转型概念，熟悉云计算、人工智能、大数据等互联网技术在大型集团企业业务中的应用，尤其数据中台和业务中台领域； 3、具备与客户信息化、技术负责人等关键人员的沟通能力和技巧，能够影响上述人员的上云决策；  4、具有优秀的学习能力，良好的承压和问题解决能力，习惯于寻找创新方法来达成目标。  具备以下行业技能优先： 1、具备集团客户业务基础架构,解决方案整体咨询和概要设计能力，熟练掌握咨询设计相关方法论。 2、对央国企等相关业务领域有大型咨询项目或者实施项目经验者优先考虑，熟悉政府工作流程，深度参与过相关政府信息化工作支撑者优先考虑。 3、熟悉业内相关大数据、区块链等新技术，可独立支撑其相关业务咨询、技术咨询、规划、设计等专业服务者优先考虑。 4、通过腾讯云技术认证或同等资格认证的优先录取。 通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取

title: 3D 캐릭터 아티스트
responsibilities: 1. 업무내용 Lightspeed Studio 소속 중앙 미술팀으로써 각종 글로벌 시장을 타겟으로 한 AAA 프로젝트 및 Art Demo 제작 및 지원. 프로젝트 성격에 부합하는 하이 퀄리티 캐릭터 모델과 텍스쳐를 제작하여 협업 부서에 제공합니다. 스튜디오와 업계를 선도 할 수 있는 수준의 작품을 제작하여 협업 부서와 업계의 Visual Standard를 만들어 냅니다. 캐릭터 원화를 이해하고, 분석하여 3D 로 구현 및 발전시키며, 협업 부서와의 긴밀한 커뮤니케이션을 통해 최상의 결과물을 도출합니다. 능동적으로 업무를 처리하며, 독자적으로 혹은 협업 부서와 함께 각종 문제를 해결하고, 아트디렉터와 함께 3D 리소스 아트 스타일과 비젼을 만들어냅니다. 전문가 레벨의 지식과 경험을 스튜디오, 외주업체 및 업계와 공유하며 지속적인 전문분야 탐구를 통해 상호 발전에 공헌합니다.
qualifications: 2. 지원자격 학력 : 무관 경력 : 5년이상 3. 필수조건 게임에 대한 열정과 “Game play first”에 근거한 기획팀과의 커뮤니케이션 능력 원활한 커뮤니케이션과 팀워크 능력. 인체 해부학과 색채, 형태 및 구도등의 미술 기초 원리에 대한 완벽한 이해. 3D 인게임 혹은 씨네매틱 리소스 제작경험(하이폴, 로우폴 및 텍스쳐 제작) 3D 제작 파이프라인에 대한 전문가 레벨의 경험과 지식. PBR 에 대한 이해와 제작능력. 제작 규범 제작 및 관리 능력. 멘토링 능력. 능동적인 업무 진행능력. Maya, Max, ZBrush, Substance tool, Photoshop 혹은 기타 상용 3D 소프트웨어의 전문가수준 사용능력. 4. 우대사항 디지털 휴먼 제작 경험 다양한 게임 개발용 엔진에 대한 이해와 전문가 레벨의 사용능력 멀티 태스킹 능력 (3D 캐릭터 제작외의 기타 분야 전문가 수준 제작능력. 라이팅, TA, 렌더링, 원화, 배경제작 및 기타) 다양한 장르의 게임과 아트스타일 및 플랫폼에 대한 제작 경험 외주업체 관리 및 지도 경험 영어 및 중국어 능력 5. 기타사항 한국 오피스 혹은 본사(중국 심천) 근무에 대한 선택옵션 제공 가능 한글 이력서 및 포트폴리오 필수

title: 40163-《王者荣耀-世界》游戏UI设计(上海 / 成都）
responsibilities: 1、负责游戏产品界面与交互设计； 2、负责游戏中UI界面、切图、游戏图标、道具等设计； 3、能够执行和制定相关设计规范； 4、正确理解策划需求案和项目需求，参与游戏资源管理，配合程序输出美术资源。
qualifications: 1. 美术或相关专业毕业、具备优秀的设计表现能力。游戏行业从业经验3年以上,至少有1款上线游戏的完整UI设计经验，并经历过改进过程； 2. 具备独立设计制作符合项目美术风格的游戏界面、交互动画等的能力； 3. 对交互设计有深刻的理解，并对RPG类UI有研究者优先； 4. 有较强的综合分析能力，创新能力，准确理解工作需求并高效完成。

title: 40163-天美L2射击项目-资深场景关卡设计师（成都）
responsibilities: 负责地图3D美术开发和最终性能优化; 理解TA的技术框架，完善技术框架匹配对应的风格特点; 对接外部公司完成多条管线并行开发工作; 和PM配合设计外包制作流程; 和TA程序配合设计工业化管线工具;
qualifications: 极强的美术功底，有一定的2D设计的能力; 有手机游戏地图开发经验，熟悉关卡性能优化方案; UE4熟练使用，有手机游戏经验; 有开发材质库和底层资源模板的能力.

title: 40163-天美L2射击项目-资深特效设计师（成都）
responsibilities: 熟悉UE4开发次时代特效； 和策划对接，负责游戏过场动画的整合把控； 使用游戏引擎做视频级内容开发，负责视频品质输出； 配合TA和程序设计前期视频管线流程； 负责英雄展示效果的特效把控，负责皮肤开发的特效外包品质；
qualifications: 熟练使用UE4开发特效； 前期视频规划和后期合成的能力熟练使用合成剪辑工具； 整体规划特效性能，制定规范标准； 和TA配合开发shader的能力，做shader规划和规范； 规范制定和生产流程设计的能力。

title: 40163-天美L2预研项目-资深3D角色设计师（成都）
responsibilities: 制定标杆表现，配合动画做前期模型规范； 对接外部公司完成多条管线并行开发工作； 和PM配合设计开发流程的能力； 和TA配合开发Shader，工具管线的能力；
qualifications: 极强的美术功底，制作符合目标的标杆角色； 熟悉新的开发方法，对整体规划有很强的理解； 很好的流程管线化思路； 有带外包团队开发的经验和资源整合能力。

title: 40163-天美L2射击项目-资深动画设计师（成都）
responsibilities: 制定动画风格，拆解动画方向的细则； 配合TA程序做前期Gameplay的动画测试； 对接外部公司完成多条管线并行开发工作； 和PM配合设计开发流程的能力；
qualifications: 极强的动画功底，会使用动捕数据； 有1-3年手机游戏动画开发经验； 熟悉MAYA开发环境和UE4开发环境； 熟悉面部表情动画相关的技术工具； 有影视相关工作经验。

title: 40163-《王者荣耀-世界》高级技术策划（上海 / 杭州 / 成都）
responsibilities: 智能化NPC表现流程搭建和工具设计，开放世界过程化流程搭建和工具设计，包括但不限于大世界相关设计规划制作 ，玩法功能管线设计和具体玩法制作; NPC设计、资源需求拆分、NPC美术资源配置、NPC行为AI编写配置、NPC表演配置：包括NPC的对话和周围情境； 围绕世界观和大世界NPC设计体验的事件； 相关玩法、流程、演出设计制作
qualifications: 3年以上工作经历，熟悉Unreal引擎，熟练使用蓝图; 本科以上，理工科及计算机相关专业； 沟通协调能力强，有一定的规划统筹能力。

title: TEG09-视频编解码高级研发工程师（深圳 / 北京）
responsibilities: 265 / AV1 / 266编码器的研发，包括编码框架和数据流、码控、汇编、压缩工具、加速算法等技术点； RTC场景下终端编码器的研发，包括不同平台的汇编、结合会议场景的编码算法优化、SVC / SCC编码工具、AI编码等技术点； 负责视频编码器在各种平台的研发实现以及终端编码的设计和优化。
qualifications: 有3~5年视频编码经验； 熟悉视频编码技术，特别是H. 264和H. 265，深入理解算法细节，熟悉码控、ROI、SVC或SCC等编码技术； 有终端编码优化经验，熟悉window / linux / iOs等多平台设计实现，有汇编优化经验，熟悉NEON或x86系列汇编； 在ARM平台上做过视频编码器优化，特别是H265编码器优化； 良好的计算机科学基础, 熟练使用至少一门编程语言(C \ C++）； 最好对webrtc / ffmpeg也比较熟悉，特别是视频编码和webRTC之间的接口和控制策略比较熟悉； 最好有一定AI编码压缩和码控优化经验。 7. 最好对视频业务如会议、云游戏、虚拟直播、在线教育等比较熟悉，有会议、云游戏等实时视频通讯系统的产品经验。

title: 41071-子公司-腾讯会议Android端开发工程师（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1. 负责视频会议Android端业务开发； 2. 负责视频会议业务开发； 3. 负责视频会议稳定性及性能优化； 4. 负责视频会议客户反馈问题跟进及效率工具开发；
qualifications: 1. 本科及以上学历，计算机或软件工程相关专业；

column1: 2. 1年以上安卓开发经验，计算机基础扎实，熟悉主流框架及原理；
3. 熟悉安卓UI框架、线程、进程特性，熟悉安卓性能指标、监控工具及调优方法；
4. 熟悉TCP / IP、UDP、HTTP等网络协议及特性，有相关的开发经验；
5. 具备良好的分析解决问题能力，良好的学习和分享习惯，工作积极主动，责任心强；
6. 有跨平台开发经验优先。
备注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位 通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取
